revised_title: Zoological and Orthopteran Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author, Arthur Gardiner Butler, presents a detailed account of the zoological and orthopteran collections made during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez. The study includes 15 species of Orthoptera and 20 species of Hemiptera, with five new species discovered in each group. The author discusses the geographical distribution and classification of these insects, providing valuable insights into the fauna of these islands.
